title:
Asymptotics of a Gauss hypergeometric function related to moments of
  symmetric-square $L$-functions II
abstract:
We prove an asymptotic formula for $F\left(1/4-it+ir,1/4-it-ir,1/2;x \right)$
as $r, t\to\infty$ and $\alpha=r/t\to0.$ This special case of the Gauss
hypergeometric function appears in the explicit formula for the first moment of
Maass form symmetric-square $L$-functions.
